sentences.en: A pair of orioles alighted on the frisking branch of a weeping willow.
sentences.cn: 一对黄鹂飞落在拂动着的柳树枝条上.

sentences.en: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.cn: 他还从桤树、松树和柳树上捕捉到了花粉。

sentences.en: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.cn: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

sentences.en: Huei - fang was leaning against a willow, dabbing her eyes with a handkerchief.
sentences.cn: 四小姐蕙芳正靠在一棵杨柳树上用手帕揉眼睛.

sentences.en: I don't think I can stand much of Lock Willow.
sentences.cn: 我实在无法在洛克威洛住下去.

sentences.en: Jenny weaves baskets from willow she grows herself.
sentences.cn: 珍妮用她自己种的柳树的枝条编篮子。

sentences.en: She walked slowly, head lowered, a willow branch in her hand.
sentences.cn: 她低着头慢慢地走着, 手里拿了一枝柳条.

sentences.en: The baskets are woven from strips of willow.
sentences.cn: 这些篮子是用柳条编的。

sentences.en: The river Till strained among some score of willow - covered, marshy islets.
sentences.cn: 铁尔河蜿蜒在几十个长满了柳树的沼泽小岛之间.

sentences.en: The river was sparsely lined with willow trees.
sentences.cn: 河边疏疏落落有几棵柳树.

sentences.en: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.
The willow's shadow falls on the lake.
sentences.cn: 垂柳的影子倒映在湖面上.

sentences.en: These willow saplings will put out fresh leaves very soon.
sentences.cn: 这些柳树苗不久就要长出新叶了.

sentences.en: Willow branches swept the river's surface.
Willow catkins are fluttering in the air.
Willow trees breaking out into buds foretell the coming of spring.

trans.tran_en: a type of tree that has long thin branches and grows near water, or the wood from this tree
